code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AccessPage(_ref){let{onAccess}=_ref;const[code,setCode]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);try{const res=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/classes/access',{codeAcces:code});if(res.data.photos){onAccess(code,res.data.photos);setError('');}}catch(err){setError('Code invalide');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:code,onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value),placeholder:"Entrez le code d'acc\xE8s",className:"code-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Valider"})]}),loading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Chargement..."}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:error})]});}export default AccessPage;
